name: Tiny Bites Dessert Shop
description:
This game is a making dessert game! You need to take customers’ orders and serve them the right desserts. Now what you need to do is read the instructions on walls then you can start our game! 

Instruction

Try it make serve customers the right desserts!! Read the order carefully and follow the steps strictly to avoid creating failed desserts. 

VR: Use teleport to move and trigger to pick up the things. Click the instruction button on the left-hand-side wall to get more information.

Without VR: use mouse left click to have basic interactions, right click to rotate the camera and w,a,s,d to move. Press Escape to quit the game and R to restart the game.

REMEMBER: Don’t serve the failed desserts to customers and they will not eat them, throw the failed ones in the rubbish bin instead.

NOTE: It is different when playing with VR and without VR, some problems might occur.

Developer: Judy Mao

Art Direction: Ellie Zhu, Hana Che
